text: Imana yaratanze akarorero kuri babantu babi bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri, nawe n’umutambukanyi w’intumwa y’Imana Nuhu (iii) hamwe n’umutambukanyi w’intumwa y’Imana Lutwi (iii), kuko bari mu bantu bacu beranda, mugabo baratiriganye ku mabanga yabo ntiba shobora kubafasha kukintu icarico cose imbere y’Imana, haca havugwa hati:- nimwinjire mu muriro udahera hamwe naba winjira mwo
